original_text: As keepers of a field, are they against her round about; because she hath been rebellious against me, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 밭을 지키는 자 같이 예루살렘을 에워싸나니 이는 그가 나를 거역했기 때문이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: As keepers of a field, are they against her round about;
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 밭을 지키는 자들이 그녀를 둘러싸고 있는 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: because she hath been rebellious against me,
